# Meet the R-HTA in LMICs Committee

The R-HTA in LMICs team comprises individuals from Lower-Middle Income Countries with diverse backgrounds passionate about improving healthcare decision-making through open-source tools and collaborative learning.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
#| cache: false

library(yaml)
library(glue)

committee <- yaml::read_yaml("files_for_update/commitee.yml")

group_order <- c("leadership", "scientific")
group_titles <- c(
  leadership = "Co-Chairs",
  scientific = "Scientific Committee Members"
)

for (group in group_order) {
  group_members <- Filter(function(m) m$group == group, committee)
  if (length(group_members) > 0) {
    cat(glue("<h2 class='committee-group-title'>{group_titles[[group]]}</h2>"))
    cat('<div class="team-grid">')
    
    for (member in group_members) {
      links <- c()
      if (!is.null(member$linkedin)) {
        links <- c(links, glue('<a href="{member$linkedin}" target="_blank" class="social-icon"><i class="fab fa-linkedin"></i></a>'))
      }
      if (!is.null(member$website)) {
        links <- c(links, glue('<a href="{member$website}" target="_blank" class="social-icon"><i class="fas fa-globe"></i></a>'))
      }
      links_html <- paste(links, collapse = " ")
      
      cat(glue(
        '<div class="member-card">',
          '<div class="member-photo">',
            '<img src="{member$image}" alt="{member$name} photo">',
          '</div>',
          '<div class="member-info">',
            '<h3>{member$name}</h3>',
            '<p class="member-role">{member$role}</p>',
            '<p class="member-description">{member$description}</p>',
            '<div class="member-links">{links_html}</div>',
          '</div>',
        '</div>'
      ))
    }
    
    cat('</div>')  # END TEAM GRID
  }
}



```

```{=html}
<style>
/* Title for each group */
.committee-group-title {
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  margin: 3rem 0 1.5rem 0;

.team-grid {
```
